Blazej is enthusiast of all aspects of big data processing and all technologies that bring this enthusiasm from dream into reality – like CUDA. For over ten years he has been involved in many challenging projects related to image and laser data processing. He is the author of automated traffic signs detection and recognition system. Blazej is co-author of Road DNA positioning concept and patent application.
